modName: Solitude Tales - Menu Visual and Music Replacer
summary: Change of visual from the bleak default Skyrim main menu to the glorious city of Solitude in companionship with Malukah's cover of "Three Hearts as One". I do not own any rights to this song.
descriptionHtml:
[center]﻿[img]https://i.imgur.com/aNQFKpn.png[/img]

[size=5]•• ━━━━━ ••[color=#ff0000]●[/color]•• ━━━━━ ••[/size]
[size=5]The third release of my menu series
•• ━━━━━ ••[color=#ff0000]●[/color]•• ━━━━━ ••

[color=#ffff00][u][size=6]Introduction[/size][/u][/color]
[size=4]Whether you declare yourself as an Imperial or a Stormcloak, we can all come to agreement that the city of Solitude is a wonderous location full of beauty and riches. The general location, be it upon an arch above the sea, works alongside other marvelous features in creating the perfect city, home for a family or just a general visit. There is nothing I enjoy more than a visit to Solitude in my adventures. So, presenting...[color=#ffff00] Solitude Tales.[/color]

I think it's obvious that [url=https://www.malukah.com/]Malukah[/url]﻿'s covers are a common theme on the menus I create. I really struggle to find a song to compete. So, in this package you are welcomed by Malukah's cover of "Three Hearts as One" from the ESO bards. Yeah, wrong game, I know, but we're still in the same universe so accept it, lol. Visually, I have found a wonder of art from the beach perspective baring every detail of the city possible. I can't find the author, so if anybody knows who created this image, please let me know ASAP. Definitely not going uncredited any time soon.[/size]

[color=#ffff00][size=6][u]Installation[/u][/size][/color]
[size=4][i][b][color=#ff0000]>>> MAKE SURE YOU HAVE YOUR FILES BACKED UP INCASE OF UNINSTALLATION[/color][/b][/i] [color=#ff0000][i][b]<<<[/b][/i][/color][/size]
[size=4]The installation process is simple. All you need to do is download the .zip file manually and place it in your Skyrim folder. Seen as the folder is named "[color=#ffff00]Data[/color]" it will automatically place all the sub-folders [color=#ffff00]into your Data folder[/color]. Requires nothing more.[/size]

[color=#ffff00][u][size=6]Uninstallation[/size][/u][/color]
[size=4]Delete the files located in these directories and replace them with the default files, or other of your choice.[/size]
[color=#ffff00]Wallpaper:[/color] [size=4]C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\common\Skyrim\Data\textures\interface\objects then delete [color=#ffff00]mainmenuwallpaper.dds
[size=6][size=5]Music:[/size] [/size][/color]C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\common\Skyrim\Data\music\special then delete [color=#ffff00]mus_maintheme.xwm[/color]

[size=6]▅▄▃▁▁▁▁▁▁▁▁▁▁▁▁▁▁▁▁▁▁▁▁▁▂▃▄▅[/size]
[/size]
[color=#ffff00]I'm open to people sending me screenshots of scenery they have personally taken or music they have created if you are interested in having your song or image made into a menu screen and featured as a mod. Credits will be signed straight to you, not me and I would only have part in the posting of your content. This is only done with your permission. Don't hesitate to private message me if you would like this to take place. Thanks and enjoy!
[color=#ffffff][size=6]▅▄▃▁▁▁▁▁▁▁▁▁▁▁▁▁▁▁▁▁▁▁▁▁▂▃▄▅[/size][/color][/color]
[/size][/center]
author: TentorIV
